sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you've been to the <radical>moon</radical> in the <radical>past</radical>, you had to get the special <radical>stamp</radical> on your <kanji>leg</kanji>.
meaningInfo: This leg stamp not only proved you went, but lets everyone around you know you've been to the moon before!
readingMnemonic: You've only met one other person with the same mark on their <kanji>leg</kanji> and it was <reading>Kyaku</reading> (<ja>きゃく</ja>) the customer. Kyaku visits many places all over the world, so it only makes sense that they've also been off-world too.
readingInfo: Picture Kyaku lifting up their pant leg and showing you all the stamps from all the different places they've been. There are even some planets on there!
